gpt_comment: The weather in Brussels is set to be sunny with averages around 24.3°C, peaking at 28°C and dipping to 20°C. There's consensus on no rain and light winds. It's a perfect day for a stroll in the park, perhaps spotting the monkeys at the Zoo of Antwerp.
